name: Under The Mask
description:
"Under the Mask" is a mask-themed deck-building game. Within the limited number of steps, encounter events, collect masks, and use the mask you build to give the enemy a fatal blow!

Game features

  • A deck that is extremely easy to build: you can keep one mask from multiple masks each round; you can also get stronger masks from the revealed tarot cards; you can even seal the enemy Make the mask work for you!
  • More possible upgrades: Find a priestess to enchant your mask, pray for power to bless your mask, and evolve your mask through faith! "Crow" evolves into "Plague Doctor", "Smile Face" evolves into "Clown"...
  • A furnace full of possibilities: Masks broken in battle will give you various ability fragments: "Dodge", "Revive", "Accuracy"... Through the furnace, you can invest these fragments to create a The most powerful mask that combines various abilities!
  • Mask is life: A brave man who returns from the underworld, your face must not be exposed to the world of the sun. Make sure you wear at least one mask during battle!
